188.text:
I always believe in building hides it is really
important that you have a good background

196.text:
because if the sun was to come out, with no
background in your hide, you will be silhouetted

202.text:
quite sharply and it is amazing how much pigeons
will see that. You think you are well covered

208.text:
behind the net, but they will see the movement
because you have nothing behind you. So I

212.text:
always feel it is very important to have a
good background in the hide.

for shoot. The gunsmith rang me up and told

On the right days they can be very, very handy

you can make a bag up very quickly with them,

452.text: a lot of cartridges with not a lot of return.

We start with what we believe to be Britain’s

The Larder weight is 33lb making the animal

with a Blaser Success. It was the end of a

It has been a week for big fish too. A lucky
angler has broken the record for landing the

584.text:
biggest cod caught in the English Channel
- on his first ever fishing trip. Chris Proctor,

589.text:
31, thought at first his hook had caught on
the ship wreck his boat was floating above

593.text:
such was the colossal size of the catch. It
took him 30 minutes to land and it put up

596.text:
such a fight that his stomach was covered
in bruises from where the base of his rod

597.text:
Carl Zeiss has won a 'Golden Keiler' award
for its new Duralyt range of riflescopes.

603.text:
The German sports optics company outpaced
well-known competitors in the New Riflescope

608.text:
category at the Jagd & Hunt shooting show
in Germany with its illuminated Duralyt 3-12x50.

613.text:
Here is Armin Dobat of Zeiss collecting the
prize.

618.text:
Fishing rivers look set to suffer from this

623.text:
of England. The Environment Agency says fish are
already suffering in the worst drought affecting England in

628.text:
more than 100 years. Now, water companies
have obtained permission to top up reservoirs

639.text:
